lines.text: I can't control this thing between my legs!
[asked about the gas he's just used]
A very exotic drug from Asia. More commonly known as "Indian Hemp" or "marijuana".
Great Scott! You've all been doped!
I'm a collector of unusual insects
Unfortunately his war wounds prevented him from doing certain things...
A lot of chaps couldn't hunt after the war.
This is the last straw! England crushed by Australia!
Is this seemly, Mrs. Platt-Higgins, playing popular music and your husband only ten years dead?
